00030 #ifndef CONSTRAINT_DYNAMIC_UNARY_NOT_INLITERAL_H
00031 #define CONSTRAINT_DYNAMIC_UNARY_NOT_INLITERAL_H
00032 
00033 // Checks if a variable is equal to a value.
00034 template<typename Var>
00035   struct WatchNotLiteralConstraint : public AbstractConstraint
00036 {
00037   virtual string constraint_name() { return "WatchedNotLiteral"; }
00038 
00039   Var var;
00040 
00041   DomainInt val;
00042 
00043   template<typename T>
00044   WatchNotLiteralConstraint(StateObj* _stateObj, const Var& _var, const T& _val) :
00045     AbstractConstraint(_stateObj), var(_var), val(_val) {}
00046 
00047   int dynamic_trigger_count()
00048   { return 0; }
00049 
00050   virtual void full_propagate()
00051   { 
00052     var.removeFromDomain(val); 
00053   }
00054 
00055 
00056   virtual void propagate(DynamicTrigger* dt)
00057   {
00058     PROP_INFO_ADDONE(WatchInRange);
00059     var.removeFromDomain(val); 
00060   }
00061 
00062   virtual BOOL check_assignment(DomainInt* v, int v_size)
00063   {
00064     D_ASSERT(v_size == 1);
00065     return (v[0] != val);
00066   }
00067 
00068   virtual vector<AnyVarRef> get_vars()
00069   { 
00070     vector<AnyVarRef> vars;
00071     vars.reserve(1);
00072     vars.push_back(var);
00073     return vars;
00074   }
00075 
00076   virtual bool get_satisfying_assignment(box<pair<int,DomainInt> >& assignment)
00077   { 
00078     D_ASSERT(var.inDomain(var.getMin()) && var.inDomain(var.getMax()));
00079     DomainInt tmp;
00080     if((tmp = var.getMin()) != val)
00081     {
00082         assignment.push_back(make_pair(0, tmp));
00083         return true;
00084     }
00085     else if((tmp = var.getMax()) != val)
00086     {
00087         assignment.push_back(make_pair(0, tmp));
00088         return true;
00089     }
00090     return false;
00091   }
00092 };
00093 
00094 struct WatchNotLiteralBoolConstraint : public AbstractConstraint
00095 {
00096   virtual string constraint_name() { return "WatchedNotLiteral"; }
00097 
00098   BoolVarRef var;
00099 
00100   DomainInt val;
00101 
00102   template<typename T>
00103   WatchNotLiteralBoolConstraint(StateObj* _stateObj, const BoolVarRef& _var, const T& _val) :
00104     AbstractConstraint(_stateObj), var(_var), val(_val) 
00105   {
00106     cout << "using boolean specialisation" << endl; 
00107   }  
00108 
00109   int dynamic_trigger_count()
00110   { return 0; }
00111 
00112   virtual void full_propagate()
00113   { 
00114     var.removeFromDomain(val); 
00115   }
00116 
00117   virtual void propagate(DynamicTrigger* dt)
00118   {
00119     PROP_INFO_ADDONE(WatchInRange);
00120     var.removeFromDomain(val); 
00121   }
00122 
00123   virtual BOOL check_assignment(DomainInt* v, int v_size)
00124   {
00125     D_ASSERT(v_size == 1);
00126     return (v[0] != val);
00127   }
00128 
00129   virtual vector<AnyVarRef> get_vars()
00130   { 
00131     vector<AnyVarRef> vars;
00132     vars.reserve(1);
00133     vars.push_back(var);
00134     return vars;
00135   }
00136   
00137   virtual bool get_satisfying_assignment(box<pair<int,DomainInt> >& assignment)
00138   {
00139     if(var.inDomain(1 - val))
00140     {
00141       assignment.push_back(make_pair(0, 1 - val));
00142       return true;
00143     }
00144     return false;
00145   }
00146 };
00147 
00148 AbstractConstraint*
00149 BuildCT_WATCHED_NOTLIT(StateObj* stateObj, const vector<BoolVarRef>& vec, const ConstraintBlob& b)
00150 { return new WatchNotLiteralBoolConstraint(stateObj, vec[0], b.constants[0][0]); }
00151 
00152 template<typename VarArray1>
00153 AbstractConstraint*
00154 BuildCT_WATCHED_NOTLIT(StateObj* stateObj, const VarArray1& _var_array_1, const ConstraintBlob& b)
00155 { 
00156   return new WatchNotLiteralConstraint<typename VarArray1::value_type>
00157     (stateObj, _var_array_1[0], b.constants[0][0]); 
00158 }
